Reuse and Sharing
Reuse means to build new applications 
assembling components already built
Advantages:
• Less money
• Less time
• Less resources
Sharing is when different 
applications use the some resources
Areas:
• Software 
• Knowledge
• Communications
• Interfaces
•---
